test_output_summary: No tests required for documentation task. Manual verification performed.
implementation_notes: Created North Star document at .claude/rules/feature-build-invariants.md (1923 bytes, under 2KB target). Document includes: (1) What You Are section defining autonomous orchestrator identity, (2) What You Are NOT section listing anti-patterns, (3) Six IMMUTABLE invariants from TASK-REV-7549, (4) Player and Coach role constraints with DO/DON'T guidance, (5) ADR quick reference table for FB-001/002/003, (6) When Stuck recovery guidance, (7) Quick Reference paths. Path patterns correctly target guardkit/orchestrator/**/*.py and guardkit/commands/feature_build.py for automatic loading.
